fields.description:
Just the filename without the extension .ics.
Normally the public file Urlaubskalender.ics is created in the following location: Your domain/files/Urlaubskalender.ics If you adjust the name and path in this field, the old file will be deleted the next time the calendar file is overwritten. The file will be regenerated every time an approved "Leave Application" is saved.
fields.label: Name of calendar export ICS file

fields.description: Absolute Path of the folder in which the ICS file will be saved, for example: /home/xxxxxxxxxx/owncloud/calendar/. Make sure this folder is writable by frappe user. Leave this field empty if you want to make the file public.
fields.label: ICS folder path

fields.description:
To avoid having to generate a workday for each employee individually, you can use this function to generate the workdays for the last 7 days for all employees at the same time. These are the basis for the Work Hour Report.
To do this, you should ensure that a Holiday List is linked in all employees and that a Weekly Working Hour has been created for each employee. 
Also, be sure that all Employee Checkins are entered correctly before generating.
fields.label: Generate Workdays automatically

fields.description: It will be generated for every Employee
fields.label: Generate Workdays for past 7 days now
Day
fields.options:
Sunday
Monday
Tuesday
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday

fields.description: Employees selected in this fields will receive all anniversary notification for employees in same company
fields.label: Anniversary Notification Email List

fields.description: Employees who has Role selected in this fields will receive all anniversary notification of employees in same company
fields.label: Anniversary Notification Email Recipient Role

fields.description: Employees who are leaver approver for other other employees will receive anniversary notification of their leave approvee
fields.label: Enable Work Anniversaries notification for Leave Approvers

fields.description: Email Recipient Role and Leavers Approvers will receive advance notification (no. of  days selected in this field)
fields.label: Notification (x days) before
Workday break Calculation Mechanism
fields.options:
Break Hours from Employee Checkins
Break Hours from Weekly Working Hours
Break Hours from Weekly Working Hours if Shorter breaks

fields.description: Swapping behavior in Workday for some specific cases
fields.label: Swap Hours worked and Actual Working Hours

fields.description: Enable email notifications to alert specified recipients whenever a scheduled job fails.
fields.label: Enable Failed Scheduled Job Log Monitoring
